Ms. UNDERWOOD. Mr. Speaker, I was unable to attend a vote today.  However, had I been present, I would have voted ``Nay'' on roll call  No. 270, H.R. 4922, DC CRIMES Act of 2025.

Mr. Speaker, I rise to speak in support of H.R. 1767, the Awning  Safety Act.

In 2019, the Consumer Product Safety Commission issued a recall of  270,000 motorized awnings sold in the United States that had caused six  injuries and, tragically, one death. While I commend the CPSC for  taking action to protect Americans from…
